name: The Bad Thoughts
description:
You play as a troubled man who's been having bad thoughts and low self esteem lately. He's always being picked on, and his life is falling apart. He decides to venture into his own mind, to cut off the negative energy from his life.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys: Move
Z: Jump
X: Swing sword



Special thanks to my good friend Spacespy, who made the music for this game!
